CustomField.formula:
IF( Event_Director_Lookup__c="", "Unassigned",
CASE( Event_Director_Lookup__c ,
"00530000006Ba2u", "POD: Erica Patterson", /*Erica Patterson*/ "0051O00000D9n84", "POD: Erica Patterson", /*Zach Thorn*/ "00530000003A32J", "POD: Erica Patterson", /*Liese Miller*/ "0055Y00000I08ta", "POD: Erica Patterson", /*Jessica Byerly*/ "00514000009tRCS", "POD: Erica Patterson", /*Danni Chisick*/
"00530000003A32J", "POD: Liese Miller", /*Liese Miller*/ "005Jw00000AMu5p", "POD: Liese Miller", /*Monique Scott*/ "005Jw000011JXqQ", "POD: Liese Miller", /*Mindy Lejune*/ "005Jw00000TXjKE", "POD: Liese Miller", /*Jordan Wilkins*/
"0051O00000D9n84", "POD: Zach Thorn", /*Zach Thorn*/ "0055Y00000I090C", "POD: Zach Thorn", /*Helen Kang*/ "0055Y00000IQPQ4", "POD: Zach Thorn", /*Ken Skeen*/ "0051O00000CqEGA", "POD: Zach Thorn", /*Mark Androvich*/
Event_Director_Lookup__r.FirstName & " " & Event_Director_Lookup__r.LastName))
CustomField.label: Event Director POD
